programme.title: Carnival of Souls

programme.title: The Curse of Frankenstein
programme.desc: The condemned baron (Peter Cushing) recalls making a mute monster (Christopher Lee) in his own image.

programme.desc: Victorian scientists (Christopher Lee, Peter Cushing) fight a missing-link monster making zombies on a trans-Siberia train.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' Invisible Man
programme.desc: While working in the lab, scientist Peter Brady gets exposed to a radiation leak and becomes invisible; the British government wants to classify him as top secret and lock him up, but he escapes.

programme.desc: The owner of a haunted mansion offers a group of people reward money if they can survive a night at his scary estate.
